calculator.note_p2: Calculate the approximate data transfer time based on your internet speed.

network_test.title: Network Speed Test
network_test.description: Test your internet connection speed and quality with our network speed test tool.
network_test.about_p1: A network speed test measures the performance of your internet connection. It evaluates several key metrics:
network_test.ping_desc: Measures the response time in milliseconds. Lower ping means better responsiveness.
network_test.download_desc: How quickly data can be transferred from the internet to your device, measured in Mbps.
network_test.upload_desc: How quickly data can be transferred from your device to the internet, measured in Mbps.
network_test.about_p2: Connection speeds can vary based on many factors including network traffic, time of day, and the number of devices connected to your network.
network_test.description_long: This tool has a direct connection with Ariyabod Technology and Internet Services Company and is provided to you solely by the company's software development team to measure the speed and quality of internet connection for Ariyabod subscribers.
network_test.guide_description: For a speed test, consider the following important points and then click the start test button.
network_test.guide_item1: Make sure your Wi-Fi signal is strong.
network_test.guide_item2: Before running the test, disconnect any VPN connection to another network.
network_test.guide_item3: Disconnect other devices using your internet connection (computer, mobile, tablet, etc.) and connect to the internet with only one device.
network_test.guide_item4: Stop all running downloads and close other browser tabs.
network_test.guide_item5: You can also temporarily disable automatic updates for your antivirus software and other programs. Don't forget to restore your antivirus settings to automatic mode after completing the speed test.
network_test.support_message: Finally, if you have any dissatisfaction or complaints, you should contact the support department of Ariyabod Technology and Internet Services Company.

about_us.main_description: Ariyabod Companies Group is a regional company located in Herat, Afghanistan. The company began its initial activities in 2019 in the advertising services sector, and in early 2020, expanded its operations to provide better and more up-to-date services in Information and Communication Technology (ICT). In 2021, the opening of another service branch to the Ariyabod Companies Group demonstrates the planning, effort, and perseverance of the Ariyabod team for continuous growth. Quantitative and qualitative growth has been the main concern of the Ariyabod team, and in this regard, we have strived to meet the needs of society and technology enthusiasts as a young team by providing quality Internet Service Provider (ISP) services and expanding technology in our beloved country.
about_us.main_description2: Ariyabod Companies Group is a regional company located in Herat, Afghanistan. The company began its initial activities in 2019 in the advertising services sector, and in early 2020 expanded its operations to provide better and more up-to-date services in Information and Communication Technology (ICT). The Ariyabod team carries out its activities in the advertising sector which includes design, branding, social media management, office sets, and printing; in the technology sector which includes installation of security cameras, domain and hosting, video transmission, online attendance systems, electronic locks, and consultation and implementation of smart systems and networks; and in the internet services sector which includes wireless, microwave, and satellite internet with standard and quality services under the latest network security protocols.

advertising_services.title: Advertising Services:
advertising_services.description: Activities in this section include design, branding, social media management, office sets, and printing.

ict_services.title: Technology Services (ICT):
ict_services.description: Mainly includes installation of security cameras, domain and hosting, video transmission, online attendance systems, electronic locks, and consultation and implementation of smart systems and networks.

isp_services.title: Internet Services (ISP):
isp_services.description: Activities in this section include design, branding, social media management, office sets, and printing.

package_management.title: Your Internet Package Information
package_management.description: One of the goals of creating this user panel is to view and be informed about your remaining internet package volume. Fortunately, this is easily possible, as you automatically log into your user panel upon entry and can view the remaining days, remaining volume, usage volume, and a detailed report of all packages you have activated in the past and present.
package_management.note: It should be noted that this feature is exclusive to subscribers of Ariyabod Technology and Internet Services Company.
